# Glaive
## Overview
A glaive is a simple blade, mounted to the end of a pole about 7 feet in length.

| **Martial Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Glaive | 8 gp | 1d8 | 1d10 | x3 | — | 10 lbs. | S | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 146
